nodes.text: MephitaPharma, Inc was a chemical manufacturer that operated during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. The company owned a chemical factory on the moon Tilnes in the Cularin system, and the Sullustan Su'ock Ytam worked for them in the facility, as a chemist. However, by the time of the Clone Wars, MephitaPharma had discontinued their Tilnes operation and abandoned their factory there.
